/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings and trees, their green foliage contrasting with the urban architecture. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
